mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT cart.userID, cart.productCode, cart.productName, sum(cart.productPrice) OVER (PARTITION BY cart.productCode, cart.productSize) AS productPrice, SUM(cart.productCnt) OVER (PARTITION BY cart.productCode, cart.productSize) AS productCnt, cart.productSize, product.productImageUrl2, product.productModel FROM cart INNER JOIN product ON cart.productCode = product.productCode AND cart.productSize = cart.productSize WHERE cart.userID = #{userID};
mapper.insert: insert into cart(userID, productCode, productName, productPrice, productCnt, productSize) values(#{userID}, #{productCode}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productCnt}, #{productSize})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE productCode = #{productCode} AND productSize = #{productSize} AND userID = #{userID};
